snippet: Recent reports issuing grim warnings about the consequences of a warming planet should cause deniers of climate change to cease their attacks.
abstract: Editorial expresses hope that grim report from the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change will inhibit deniers and prompt the American public to fully accept the dangers posed by global warming; holds report will lend weight to Pres Obama's effort to use his executive authority under the Clean Air Act to limit greenhouse gases, particularly methane.
lead_paragraph: Recent reports issuing grim warnings about the consequences of a warming planet should cause deniers of climate change to cease their attacks.
